name: app_tokens
title: App Tokens
description: Learn how to create, view, and delete App Tokens

control_sets.title: Starting a KalturaSession
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Getting your App Tokens
control_sets.tip: App Tokens are used for generating Kaltura Sessions, and can control what privileges are granted to the user. Use ```appToken.list``` to see all of your app tokens.

control_sets.title: Creating a new App Token
control_sets.tip: Create a new app token by calling ```appToken.add```.  You can choose whether the session should have ADMIN or USER level privileges, and you can specify how long the session should last.
